verses.name: Genesis 3:11
verses.text: And he said, Who told thee that thou wast naked? Hast thou eaten of the tree, whereof I commanded thee that thou shouldest not eat?

verses.name: Genesis 3:12
verses.text: And the man said, The woman whom thou gavest to be with me, she gave me of the tree, and I did eat.

verses.name: Genesis 3:13
verses.text: And the Lord God said unto the woman, What is this that thou hast done? And the woman said, The serpent beguiled me, and I did eat.
